description: Yet another tool to connect Android phone with desktop Device Connect Yet another tool to connect Android phone with desktop similar to KDE Connect. Features: * Lightweight and fast * AES-256 encryption with password * Upload files from phone to desktop * Open files and web URLs from phone on desktop * Download files from pre-defined directories at desktop to phone * Show phone notification on desktop * Execute pre-defined commands on desktop * Periodically running sync tasks (directories, contacts, SMS, clipboard)
